snippet.title: Megamagic: Wizards of the Neon Age [Official Trailer]
snippet.description:
The unmistakable flavour of the 80s turned into a game. An action RPG and real time strategy videogame set to shake the Earth this 2016. Megamagic will be available on April 20 (Windows, Mac, Linux). 
http://store.steampowered.com/app/422650/
